mapper.select: select memberPicture, num, id, password, name, register_date, birthday, tel, address, addressNum from Travelmember
select memberPicture, num, id, password, name, register_date, birthday, tel, address, addressNum from Travelmember order by num desc limit #{start}, #{length}
select memberPicture, num, id, password, name, register_date, birthday, tel, address, addressNum from Travelmember where num = #{num}
mapper.insert: insert into Travelmember ( memberPicture, num, id, password, name, register_date, birthday, tel, address, addressNum ) values ( #{memberPicture, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{birthday, jdbcType=DATE}, #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.update: update Travelmember set memberPicture = #{memberPicture}, id = #{id}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, birthday = #{birthday}, tel = #{tel}, address = #{address}, addressNum = #{addressNum} where num = #{num}
